ygData.subject: Re: Runes in stores
ygData.msgSnippet: I am an enchanter and I have several Runes that wizards may use. but I got them off of low level creatures and in shops for very very cheep. What are the
ygData.messageBody:
I am an enchanter and I have several Runes that wizards may use. but I got
them off of low level creatures and in shops for very very cheep. What are
the hardest runes to find?


-----Original Message-----
From: Donald Taber <dtaber@...>
To: EverQuest Mailing List <eq_wizards@onelist.com>
Date: Thursday, May 13, 1999 2:36 PM
Subject: [eq_wizards] Runes in stores


>From: Donald Taber <dtaber@...>
>
>On a couple occasions I have seen runes for sale in stores for about 12
>plat. This seems high, but since they are hard to find, should I be
>picking them up? I have a reasonable amount of plat (10-20), but never
>enough where 12 is cheap.
>
> Soren
> Wizard Level 14
>
>
